title: What are benefits of freedom? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just about everything in the whole world. Human's are born with the RIGHT to freedom in everything they think, do, wish, want and need.Unfortunately governments, religions, crooks, gangs and others do their best to steal your rights, wealth and pursuit of happiness.  When I was much younger I hated the Beatles. Their big hit Imagine had the wisest verses that have ever been written. It just took me 40 years of wandering to understand them!!!
